title: Westcott 16376 Crafting Scissors, 5-Inch Titanium Micro-Tip Scissors, White/Gray
description: These Westcott scissors are lighter, stronger, and sharper than other small craft scissors. Lightweight yet durable enough for any cutting job, these 5-inch scissors feature high-performance titanium-bonded blades that resist corrosion. These small pointed scissors are ideal for cutting paper, cardboard, lightweight line, fabric, and other materials. Creating your next masterpiece is easy when you have the very best tools to work with. Westcott, the leader in cutting technology, brings you a coordinated assortment of all the essential tools you need to bring your ideas to life.
